messages.content: What features does the ComfyUI-mape-Helpers extension offer?

The ComfyUI-mape-Helpers extension includes multi-monitor image preview, variable assignment/wireless nodes, prompt tweaking, command palette, pinned favorite nodes, node navigation, fuzzy search, node time tracking, organizing, and error management.
Where can I find more information about ComfyUI-mape-Helpers?
For more information about ComfyUI-mape-Helpers, you can visit: https://comfyui.ma.pe/
What is the function of multi-monitor image preview?
The multi-monitor image preview allows users to view images across multiple monitors.
What is the wireless nodes feature?
Wireless nodes provide the ability to connect nodes without links, allowing for more flexible and customizable workflows.
What is the prompt tweaking feature for?
Prompt tweaking allows users to adjust the prompts used to generate images and videos, giving them more control over the output.
What is the command palette feature and what does it do?
The command palette feature provides a centralized location for users to access and execute various commands within ComfyUI.
